dublin_core.dcvalue: Hearing loss can affect approximately 15 of the pediatric population and up to 40 of the adult population The gold standard of treatment for hearing loss is amplification of hearing thresholds by means of a hearing aid instrument A hearing aid is an electronic device equipped with a topology of only three major components of aggregate cost The gold standard of hearing aid fittings is face to face appointments in hearing aid centers clinics or hospitals Telefitting encompasses the programming and adjustments of hearing aid settings remotely Fitting hearing aids remotely is a relatively simple procedure using minimal computer hardware and Internet access
Use of the satisfaction with amplification in daily life questionnaire to assess patient satisfaction following remote hearing aid adjustments (telefitting).
